commitResults.messageBody:
- Add user greeting message
- Add user input echoing
- Add exit command with exit message

- Input is now stored into a list instead simply being repeated
- Add "list" command which prints the items in the list in an enumerated manner
- Move all commands into constant strings for ease of access
- Add documentation for methods

- Add mark/unmark commands
- Add Task class that represents a task on the list

- Make Task no longer a private inner class in Duke
- Add derived classes ToDo, Deadline, Event that extend Task
- Add todo, deadline, event commands
- Add some command parsing safety

- Catch empty todo/deadline/event. Currently does not treat whitespaces as empty.
- Catch invalid commands
- Update Automated Text UI testing

- Support deletion using "delete" command
- Fix off-by-1 error when detecting index out of range for mark/unmark
- Add message of encouragement when task list is empty
- Update Automated Text UI Testing

- Organize into packages (duke.core, duke.command, duke.task)
- Make Duke more OOP-driven by abstracting command, parser, task
- Update test cases
- Update runtest.sh

- Duke now saves the contents of TaskList into a file (duke.txt)
- Add serialize/deserialize methods for Task
- Duke now loads from this task list when starting up

commitResults.messageTitle: Add date parsing to Deadline and Event
commitResults.messageBody:
- Make Deadline and Event use dates instead of arbitrary strings as the deadline/timing
- Add protected getFormattedDetails() method in Task for standardizing how this date is displayed
- Update input tests to account for this change
- Account for date when deserializing task

- Add JUnit tests for various Task methods for each of the task types.
- Remove some unused constants.
- Fix some style issues.

commitResults.messageTitle: Support building in gradle, add duke.txt to .gitignore
commitResults.messageBody:
- Fix mainClassName in build.gradle
- Support building of Duke as a task in gradle.
